text:
Logmatic.io | Paris, France | ONSITE | Full-Time

Logmatic.io is an Operations Data Platform for Log and Machine events. We help companies improve their software and business performance by leveraging their machine data.

We are looking for senior frontend and senior backend developers. Our stack includes VueJS, D3, Java, Scala, Kafka, Elasticsearch on MS Azure.

More info at http://logmatic.io/company/job/ or email me at emmanuel (at) logmatic.io.
